sentences.english: This is certainly not desirable, but if it meant a stronger agreement that addressed the seriousness of the problem, it may not be that bad.
sentences.chinese: “这肯定是不可取的，但如果它意味着一份解决了问题严重性的更强有力的协议，那也未必是坏事，”他说。

sentences.english: Thank you for US.I am not afraid to have HIV.I am not afraid to talk about it.YOU make me stronger, we make each other better.
sentences.chinese: 感谢美国，我不再害怕身患艾滋，我不在害怕谈论艾滋，是你让我变得强大，是你我们相互鼓舞支持使得彼此的生活更美好。

sentences.english: As a critic, he is far too subjective.
sentences.chinese: 作为评论家，他过于主观。

sentences.english: a highly subjective point of view
sentences.chinese: 相当主观的看法

detailed_translations.english: a state-ment, report, attitude etc that is subjective is influenced by personal opinion and can therefore be unfair

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

sentences.english: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

sentences.english: an old car in super condition
sentences.chinese: 一辆状况极好的旧车

sentences.english: That sounds super.
sentences.chinese: 那听起来棒极了。

sentences.english: What a super idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意太妙了！

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

detailed_translations.chinese: 特级品，特大号；临时雇员

sentences.english: He looked surprised to see Cassie standing by the front door.
sentences.chinese: 他看到卡西站在前门旁，显得很吃惊。

sentences.english: He had a surprised look on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他一脸惊讶。

sentences.english: Don’t be surprised if the interviewer is rather direct.
sentences.chinese: 如果采访的人说话比较直接，也不要吃惊。

sentences.english: I wouldn’t be surprised if she married that fellow.
sentences.chinese: 要是她嫁给那家伙，我不会感到意外。

sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

sentences.chinese: 有我们的员工向你提供技术支持。

sentences.chinese: 我一点技术知识都没有。

sentences.english: technical training
sentences.chinese: 技术培训

detailed_translations.english: connected with knowledge of how machines work

sentences.english: These findings have both theoretical and practical applications.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.english: In this process, an interaction of theoretical study with practical work . should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.english: Researchers have tossed around theoretical calculations of using just aluminum and water for rocket propellant in the past.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.english: The economy has become a troublesome issue for the Conservative Party.
sentences.chinese: 经济状况已成为保守党的一大难题。

detailed_translations.english: A troublesome situation or issue is full of complicated problems or difficulties.

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

sentences.chinese: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.chinese: 任命马特的决定几乎是一致通过的。

detailed_translations.english: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree

sentences.english: This sofa is so uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth

detailed_translations.english: a railway system under the ground

sentences.chinese: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.english: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.chinese: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.chinese: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

sentences.chinese: 不利于健康的生活环境

sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

sentences.chinese: 统一的欧洲

sentences.chinese: 这两个国家联合起来对付共同的敌人。

sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车的性能变得非常不稳定。

sentences.english: unusual circumstances

sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?

sentences.chinese: 编辑删掉了几行无用的文字。

sentences.english: Please cancel the words which are useless.
sentences.chinese: 请把无用的词划掉。

sentences.chinese: 他们把他的建议看做是无用的想法。

sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

sentences.chinese: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.chinese: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.chinese: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.chinese: 动乱以三名少年的惨死而告终。

sentences.chinese: 这个网站可让你对美术馆作一番虚拟参观。

sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.chinese: 温水

sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

sentences.english: The group meets weekly.
sentences.chinese: 小组每周见面一次。

happening or done every week

sentences.chinese: 海湾的西端

sentences.english: Western Australia
sentences.chinese: 西澳大利亚

sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

opening or spreading as much as possible

sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

sentences.chinese: 目前供应的产品

sentences.chinese: 他目前正在创作他的第一本小说。

detailed_translations.english: at the present time

sentences.chinese: 我们希望让直接卷入冲突的各国重归于好。

sentences.chinese: 守灵仪式一结束，大部分客人就立刻走了。

detailed_translations.english: with no other person, action, process etc between

sentences.english: Children have to learn to communicate effectively.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子应该学会有效地沟通。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that produces the result that was intended

sentences.english: This oil lubricates efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 这油能有效地起润滑作用。

sentences.english: That means I have to work more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 那就意味着我要工作的更有效率。

sentences.english: Others like to use them because they prefer to communicate efficiently and not miss out on any important conversations and connections.
sentences.chinese: 另一些人喜欢他们则是因为他们偏好于更有效的通信，不会错过一些重要的交谈和联系。

sentences.english: The family originally came from France.
sentences.chinese: 这个家族最初来自法国。

sentences.english: The building was originally used as a prison.
sentences.chinese: 这幢建筑最初用作监狱。

sentences.chinese: 我们原先打算只逗留几天。

sentences.chinese: 起先我们计划到苏格兰旅游，但最后没有成行。

sentences.chinese: 她年轻而且身体健康。

sentences.english: Do you find him physically attractive?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得他长得帅吗？

sentences.chinese: 一想到那个我就觉得身体不舒服。

sentences.english: children who have been physically abused
sentences.chinese: 身体受到虐待的儿童

detailed_translations.english: in relation to your body rather than your mind or emotions

sentences.english: The disease was spreading more rapidly than expected.
sentences.chinese: 疾病的蔓延比预期的要快。

detailed_translations.english: very quickly and in a very short time

sentences.english: We meet regularly, once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们定期见面，每月一次。

detailed_translations.english: at the same time each day, week, month etc

sentences.chinese: 这座城市20年中几乎没有什么改变。

sentences.english: The country had scarcely any industry.
sentences.chinese: 该国几乎没有工业。

sentences.english: He scarcely ever left the region.
sentences.chinese: 他几乎没有离开过这个地区。

sentences.chinese: 他刚坐下就有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: almost not or almost none at all

sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的孩子都乘公交车上学。

sentences.english: He was virtually unknown before running for office.
sentences.chinese: 他在参加竞选之前几乎不为人知。

detailed_translations.english: almost
